price: Dhugumatti “eenyutu samiifi dachii uumee, aduufi baatiis laaffise?” jettee yoo isaan gaafatte “Allaahdha” siin jedhu. Akkamitti (tawhiida irraa) garagalfamu ree?
arabic: وَلَئِن سَأَلۡتَهُم مَّنۡ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَسَخَّرَ ٱلشَّمۡسَ وَٱلۡقَمَرَ لَيَقُولُنَّ ٱللَّهُۖ فَأَنَّىٰ يُؤۡفَكُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wala-in sa-altahum man khalaqa al-samāwāti wal-arḍa wasakhara al-shamsa wal-qamara layaqūlunna al-lahu fa-annā yu'fakūna
